A virtual reality game where players take on the role of a fox without a tail, navigating through a magical forest filled with obstacles and challenges. Players must use their wits and cunning to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies while collecting items and resources to help them on their journey.

A stop-motion animated short film that tells the story of a fox without a tail who is on a quest to find the magical "Tail of Power," said to grant the bearer incredible abilities and strength. Along the way, the fox encounters various creatures who offer their own unique abilities and skills, forcing the fox to make difficult choices about who to trust and how to use their newfound powers.

A children's book featuring a fox without a tail who is struggling to fit in with the other foxes in the forest. With the help of a wise old owl, the fox learns to embrace their uniqueness and find their place in the world, inspiring young readers to do the same.

A board game where players take on the role of foxes competing to build the most successful den. Each player must collect resources and complete challenges to earn points, while also trying to sabotage their opponents' dens to gain an advantage. The game ends when one player has built the most successful den, or when all the foxes have run out of resources and are forced to retreat.

A theatrical puppet show featuring a fox without a tail who is on a quest to reclaim their lost tail from the clutches of a mischievous imp. Along the way, the fox encounters a cast of colorful characters, including a wise old badger, a sassy rabbit, and a mysterious witch, who help them on their journey. The show features intricate puppetry and original music, with a focus on storytelling and character development.
